column8: so now he's allowed to go and see the victim?that would be...  wrong?

no, he not allowed to see victim. unless they wanna talk about settle outside court but i not sure you can do that for molest case. but if this was politically motivated case, then definitely no settle outside
How is this politically motivated?  A deliberate honeypot trap? He's just an aide though not an MP himself.
the court didn't give order for him not to approach victim. surely she will be safe?
Just as an extra note only. no need think so much on it.I think she can apply for court order to not allow him to approach victim, need law expert to clarify this
